item.title: Hello Hugo
item.description: Welcome … and say Hello to Hugo. I'm sorry to say my love affair with WordPress is at an end.

item.title: 2019 Where am I?
item.description: Hi there. Yes, it's been awhile, but I'm back and just trying to figure out what I will do with this site.

item.title: Hello 2016
item.description: Hello - It's been a long time and now I'm back.
